summary: TL*  THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 NATIONAL SEA BREEZE RECREATIONAL VEHICLE (N/A).  WHILE DRIVING AT APPROXIMATELY 40MPH, HE ATTEMPTED TO SLOW DOWN AND THE BRAKES LOCKED. THE ABS LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL WHEN HE APPLIED THE BRAKES THE SECOND TIME AND THE BRAKES FAILED TO OPERATE. THE VEHICLE WAS LEFT AT THE DEALER FOR REPAIR, HOWEVER THE REPAIR COULD NOT BE DONE, BECAUSE THE PART WAS ON BACK ORDER. THE DEALER STATED THAT THE REPAIR WILL NOT PERMANENTLY CORRECT THE FAILURE.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY HAVE NOT DESIGNED THE PART THAT WILL PERMANENTLY CORRECT THE FAILURE YET.  THE FAILURE AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 12, 7000.
